title: Jane Addams 1903 Union League Club Address

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Addams makes to convey her message about the significance of George Washington’s legacy.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Addams makes to convey her message about the significance of George Washington’s legacy.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
